content: The lobby smelled weird and the elevator was slow. That's all I have to say.
The pool area was stunning and the spa treatments were top-notch. Staff remembered our names after the first day. Truly a luxury experience.
Nice hotel in a great neighborhood. Room service was quick and the food quality was good. Bathroom could use an update but overall satisfied.
Worst hotel experience ever. Found hair in the bathroom, noisy neighbors all night, and the front desk was unhelpful when I complained. Never coming back.
Brought my family for a weekend getaway. Kids loved the pool and the staff provided extra towels and pool toys without us asking. Very family-friendly!
It was okay. Nothing special but nothing terrible either. Bed was comfortable, location decent. Probably wouldn't go out of my way to stay here again.
